akn:content.akn:p:
§ 37. Violations; punishment Whoever knowingly commits, instigates, or assists in any act forbidden by section 34 of this title shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and shall be fined not more than $5,000, or imprisoned for not more than one year, or both. (May 27, 1921, ch. 12, § 4, 42 Stat. 8.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was not enacted as part of the Submarine Cable Act which comprises this chapter.
